CmdLine: set -x     && apk add --no-cache --virtual .gosu-deps         dpkg         git         gnupg         openssl         tini     && dpkgArch="$(dpkg --print-architecture | awk -F- '{ print $NF }')"     && wget -O /usr/local/bin/gosu "https://github.com/tianon/gosu/releases/download/$GOSU_VERSION/gosu-$dpkgArch"     && wget -O /usr/local/bin/gosu.asc "https://github.com/tianon/gosu/releases/download/$GOSU_VERSION/gosu-$dpkgArch.asc"     && export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)"     && gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys B42F6819007F00F88E364FD4036A9C25BF357DD4     && gpg --batch --verify /usr/local/bin/gosu.asc /usr/local/bin/gosu     && rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" /usr/local/bin/gosu.asc     && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/gosu     && gosu nobody true     && apk del .gosu-deps
Commands.Name: run
